Description.val: The Special Projects program modifies and/or replaces obsolete special mission equipment and integrates Quick Reaction Capability (QRC) on P-3 and P-8 aircraft.  Procurements vary in each fiscal year and include common Navy systems for increased capability, reduced operator workload and common logistics, as well as procurement of special mission equipment as directed by the Chief of Naval Operations.  Active Primary Aircraft Authorized inventory is 4 with additional 2 Backup Aircaft Authorization aircraft in the Special Mission inventory.

Justification.val:
FY2012 $11.2M Overseas Contingency Operations (OCO) is for P496 (V4.0) Production systems and Traffic Collision Avoidance System Integration. FY2013 $2.714M OCO Request is for Special Collection Equipment. 

FY2014 commences integration of QRC capabilities on the P-8 aircraft. FY2014 reduction is due to higher navy priorities. 

FY 2015 - FY 2018 increase is due to adjustments to sustain the Special Projects capabilities.

Name.@footnote: Data, Training Equipment, ILS and Other Support requirements are aligned to support First Article qualification testing in FY-16.
Installation equipment includes both Mission Unique and Improved Communication Capabilities to be installed concurrently.
Installation equipment includes both Mission Unique and Improved Communication Capabilities to be installed concurrently.

ImplementationMethodName.val: Contractor Drive In and Navy Field Mod Team

Description.val:
DESCRIPTION/JUSTIFICATION:

This modification replaces obsolescence intelligence collection equipment in six P-3 Special Project aircraft by procurement of special mission equipment as directed by the Chief of Naval Operations. FY2014 commences integration of Quick Reaction Capability capabilities on the P-8 aircraft.

FY2012 includes $4.2M for Overseas Contingency Operations (OCO) Request for P496 (V4.0) Production systems.
FY2012 includes $6.984M for OCO Request for Traffic Collision Avoidance System Integration.
FY2013 includes $2.714M for OCO Request for Special Collection Equipment.

DEVELOPMENT STATUS/MAJOR MILESTONES:  Not Applicable
